name: Rage Of Ghost
description:
Rage of Ghost is a 3D game inspired by the unity3d tutorial Survival shooter.

Rage of Ghost is a survival game which you need to survive as long as you can with the 3 different game environment,

1. The Classroom - Classroom is consist zombie teacher enemy which respawn time to time, which you need to kill until the big boss will come up., if you shoot it down the game will automatically change its level and go to "The Campus".

2. The Campus - Campus is consist mummify zombies which respawn time to time, killing the big boss will change its level to The Forest.

3. Forest - consist the three (3) different kinds of enemy combined in 1 environment., an endless part of the game.,
